titles.title: RS415 You shall go out with Joy

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You shall go out with joy,..and be led forth in peace,
and the mountains and the hills shall breakforth in singing.
There'll be shouts of joy... and the trees of the field shall clap,
shall clap their hands: and the trees of the field shall clap their hands,
and the trees of the fields shall clap their hands,
and the trees and the fields shall clap their hands,
and you'll go out in joy.
